sentences.sContent: a bowdlerized version of ‘Antony and Cleopatra’
sentences.sCn: 《安东尼和克里奥帕特拉》的删节本

remMethod.val: 来自人名Thomas Bowdler， 他删改出版了莎士比亚的戏剧

trans.tranCn: 删除(书等的)不妥的文句, 删改, 修订
trans.tranOther: to remove all the parts of a book, play etc that you think might offend someone – used to show disapproval
